name.ja: <ruby>炎<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby><ruby>妃<rt>ひ</rt></ruby> ウルカニクス

text.en: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can destroy 1 other FIRE monster in your hand or face-up field, and if you do, add 1 FIRE Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged Beast monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Fire King Consort Ulkanix", then you can make this card's Level become that monster's. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Fire King High Avatar Garunix" from your Deck in Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Fire King Consort Ulkanix" once per turn.

ja.set_name: Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG Structures Volume 8 promotional card
